comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Congratulations to winners of this EFL round:Betwrong: 1.5 mBTC free betKTChampions: 1 mBTC free betSadly, I have to announce that I am taking a break organizing this EFL Championship competitions.There are some rule changes, and my busy schedule in next few weeks and months will not allow me to continue doing this.I could come back some time in future with EFL or other competitions, but I am not making any promises.It was my absolute pleasure and I want to thank Sportsbet once again for sponsoring this competition.
